thread.title: Myriad Supply Ranked 13th on 2015 CRN Fast Growth 150 List
thread.title_full: Myriad Supply Ranked 13th on 2015 CRN Fast Growth 150 List

title: Myriad Supply Ranked 13th on 2015 CRN Fast Growth 150 List
text: Myriad Supply Ranked 13th on 2015 CRN Fast Growth 150 List List recognizes thriving solution providers in the IT channel. NEW YORK, NY, September 28,   Myriad Supply, Your Trusted Technology Experts, announced that it has been ranked 13th on The Channel Company's 2015 CRN Fast Growth 150 list. Based on gross revenue over the two-year period from 2012 to 2014, The Fast Growth 150 list ranks solution providers based in North America with significant economic growth. In a turbulent IT economy, these companies have shown exceptional prowess in growing their operations and constantly providing essential services to their customers. Through long-standing elite partnerships with Cisco, Juniper, Brocade, Arista, Fortinet, A10, Palo Alto Networks, VMware, and EMC, Myriad Supply delivers best-of-breed infrastructure solutions and services to thousands of fast-growing clients. Headquartered in the heart of New York City's Silicon Alley, Myriad serves thousands of clients in Ad Tech, Finance, Healthcare, Web 2.0, Hosting, and SaaS. Founded in 2003, Myriad has seen exponential growth in revenue and technical capability since day one. Their 184.72% two year revenue growth-rate demonstrates the tenacity of the Myriad Supply team for building collaborative relationships with clients and technology partners. With over 80 technology partnerships and global logistics capabilities, Myriad is a true one-stop-shop for global infrastructure and services. "We are proud to sit amongst this top-notch group of fast-growing technology companies. We're now seeing the impact of the investments we've made in technology and engineering, meeting and exceeding the expectations of our clients and tackling complex technical challenges across a broad range of industries", comments Andrew Fisher, CEO and Founder of Myriad Supply. "Cloud computing, mobile and big data technologies are making the industry both more exciting and more challenging than it's ever been," says Robert Faletra, CEO of The Channel Company. "Solution providers recognized in CRN's Fast Growth 150 list are rising to meet the challenge and are thriving as a result. We are pleased to recognize these firms as leaders in today's IT channel." The Fast Growth 150 list is highlighted in the October issue of CRN and can be viewed online at http://crn.com/fastgrowth.About Myriad Supply Myriad Supply, founded in 2003, is a widely recognized solution provider, delivering best-of-breed hardware in networking, data storage, WiFi, VoIP, information security, and cloud solutions. Myriad serves over 10,000 customers and has a greater than 99% customer retention rate. For more information call Myriad Supply at (866) 725-1025, or write info@myriadsupply.com. About The Channel Company The Channel Company, with established brands including CRN , XChange Events and IPED , is the channel community's trusted authority for growth and innovation. For more than three decades, we have leveraged our proven and leading-edge platforms to deliver prescriptive sales and marketing solutions for the technology channel. The Channel Company provides Communication, Recruitment, Engagement, Enablement, Demand Generation and Intelligence services to drive technology partnerships. Learn more at http://www.thechannelcompany.com. The Channel Company, CRN , XChange Events and IPED are registered trademarks of The Channel Company, LLC. All rights reserved. All other brand names, product names, or service names that appear herein are trademarks or service marks of their respective owners. # # #
